Hi, I'm Stuart.


Ever since I was a kid I've always loved building things. My craft has matured since then, but I still haven't lost the joy I get from thinking up new creations. I specialize in front-end web development, but I am always trying to expand my skillset with fresh projects in all imagineable categories.

- Email Me -

Stuart Pearman
swpearman@gmail.com

Web Work

The day I wrote my first snippet of HTML was the day I started to think about a future in web design. A few weeks later I started to realize that it may not be so far off. Here are a few things I've made in my short time as a web designer.

  • Element 84

    Site redesign and blog migration for Element 84, Inc.

  • IAMFlix

    Lead design for family friendly streaming service. Worked extensively in Ruby on Rails with a team of developers at Element 84, Inc.

Odd Projects

Though most people would refer to me as a web designer, nothing brings me greater joy than seeing my designs manifested in a physical way -- whether it's a business card, a bottle, or even a painting. Designing for other mediums than the web give me a sense of balance that I love.

  • Branding & Board Design - Concrete Coast Boards

    Idea for a skateboard or skate deck graphics company. I have always loved board sports of all kinds and would love to contribute to them.

  • Packaging & Label Design - StuBrew

    Concept for a brewing company. Expanded on the brand to include three label designs.
